Package io.github.eutro.wasm2j.conf.impl

Class BasicCallingConvention

java.lang.Object
io.github.eutro.wasm2j.conf.impl.BasicCallingConvention
All Implemented Interfaces:
CallingConvention
public class BasicCallingConvention extends Object implements CallingConvention
The ubiquitous calling convention.

Parameters are passed directly, and return values, if there are more than one, are returned in an array.

If all return types are the same, the component of the array type is that type. Otherwise, the component of the array type is Object, and all values are boxed.
